## Installation

You can install the released version of SoilR from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("SoilR")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("MPIBGC-TEE/SoilR-exp")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
## basic example code
#library(SoilR)
requireNamespace('pkgload')
pkgload::load_all('.')
# define initial values for the state variables
iv=c(barrel=1,bottle=2,glass=5)
times<-1:100
mod=Wang3p(iv,times)
   
#sol <- getSolution(mod)
#plotPoolGraph(mod)
# shortcut overview plot
plot(mod)
  
```
